snippet: Philadelphia teachers vowed to fight a sudden move by the district Monday that cancels their union contract and requires them to start paying health premiums of $55 to $140 a month.
abstract: Philadelphia teachers vow to fight sudden move by district that cancels their union contract and requires them to start paying health premiums of $55 to $140 a month come December.
lead_paragraph: Philadelphia teachers vowed to fight a sudden move by the district Monday that cancels their union contract and requires them to start paying health premiums of $55 to $140 a month.

headline.main: Pennsylvania: Health Costs Imposed on Teachers
headline.print_headline: Pennsylvania: Health Costs Imposed on Teachers
